page.title: 09LAW & ORDER PRISON OFFICER
page.content: Mr England is a Trade officer Brick- layer who has been working at Kirkham Prison for 12 momths and he enjoys working there.He needed no qualificatious expect common sense, strong will and sense of fair play.His training consisted of a stort period at a closed prison follow by eight weeks training at Prison Training College at Wakefield follow by a 12 momths period of probation.Training as a Brick-Layer was in the of an apprenticeship after leaving school.He does not actally work but supervises the inmates to ensure the is done correctly.All inmates at Kirkham work.Their work includes making wooden items,growing and packing vegetables for dispersal to other prisons,laundering for other prisons and Kirkham prison and various miscelleneous industries
